Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a plant that is healthy and growing with plenty of water and light.
The student can draw a plant that is wilted or not growing due to lack of water.
The student can draw a plant that is wilted or not growing due to lack of light.
The student can illustrate the difference in appearance between plants with and without water.
The student can illustrate the difference in appearance between plants with and without light.
